me nisa palamuwani sanshodhanaya gena eemata siduwu bawa da kiweya.meki sanshodhana dwithwaya nowambaraye pawathwena uthuru palath sabha mathiwaranaya ilakka kota gena idiripath wuwak nowana bawa mehidi awadharanaya kala amathiwaraya athamwita eya uthurata pera wayambaa ho madhyama palath sabha mathiwarana wenuwen kriyathmaka wiya haki bawada kiya.uthuru palath sabha mathiwaranaya kal damime kisidu uthsahayak nathayi da, eya niyamitha paridi sapthambar masadi pawathwenu athayida ki ee mahatha nawa sanshodhana deka eki mathiwaranaya pawathwimata pera sidu karanu athayi apeksha karana bawada sandahan kaleya. 13wani sanshodhaya sambandhayen adahas laba ganima sandaha janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha parlimenthu therim karaka sabhawak path kala bawath, eheth demala sandhanaya eyata sahabhagi nowi udayata ekak ha hawasata ekak washayen wiwidha adahas dakwamin kara ari bawa sihipath kala amathiwaraya owun yojana idiripath nokalada wagakimak athi rajayak lesa me prashnaya ayale yamata ida nodena bawath, sudusu wisandumak laba dimata katayuthu karana bawath awadharanaya kaleya.rajaye prawruththi adhyaksha janaral mahacharya aariyarathna athugala mahatha da me awasthawata sahabhagi wiya..

shila yugaye sita ilektronika yugaya dakwa yugayen yugaya samathikramanaya karamin pamini gaman maga,minisata labunu watinama de....thaman palanaya wana krama wedayata dayaka wiya haki....prajathanthrawadayayi...upathe sita maranaya dakwa ekineka samaga gatemin samuhika sathwayeku lesa jiwath wana minisa aarthikaya thula...aarthika sathwayeku lesada, samajaya thula samuhika sathwayeku lesada emenma deshapalanaya thula , deshapalana sathwayaku lesada kriya karayi!!..minisa wisin minisun udesa minisata kriyathmaka wana me prajathanthra wadaye...paramadhipathyaye balaya suluwata thakiya nohaka...eya kotuwak matha kathirayak gasimak pamanak nedayi..samaharawita oba magen asanu atha..namuth obath mamath thawath boho ayath gasana kathira matha..obeth mageth apa rateth anagathaya thiranaya wanu atha...oba niwaradi pudgalayaku soya wehesenu atha..obe kathiraya gasimata sudussaku oba soyanawa wiya haka....obata niwaradi pudgalayaku soya gatha nohaka..manda, obada mamada waradi kara aththemu!!
